title: Odd interruptions occasionally every 5 min or so maybe.
body:
In my games I get a brief interruption of connection which is odd. I called my ISP and they said that the 'outside' line/wire is great, which means it's either something on the inside or something on the server that i'm connecting to. I have a wired Ethernet connection to my PC and have an 18 Mb/s connection speed. So what happens is I can't really see certain animations or updates when the interruption happens, but i can feel that i'm still a little bit connected. So for example I can't see someone auto, but i can see the health bar going down for the person they're attacking, also they're movement is a bit eh.

If it's not the connection between me and the game server, then if someone can help diagnose what might be wrong on the 'inside' of my house.

replies.body:
The symptoms you've described are pretty commonly attributed to *Packet Loss*. There likely is an issue between your PC and the servers that is causing this, so we'll have to take a few steps to determine exactly where it's coming from. To start, I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure that this isn't being caused by a bad local network configuration that would conflict with League.

Let me know if you observed any changes as a result of the steps you've taken.
